# Data Dictionary for ABCD data: R01MH134039


Data in this dictionary represents only variables obtained and cleaned for this project -- the complete set of raw variables available from the ABCD cohort can be found in the larger ABCD [data dictionary](https://data-dict.abcdstudy.org/). 

```{r include=FALSE}

), 'packages.bib')
```
